#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
char s[100009];
cin>>s;
int count;
if(s[0]=='X')
count=1;
else
count=2;
int i=1,del=0;
while(s[i]!='\0')
{
if(count==1)
{
if(s[i]=='Y')
{
count=2;
}
else
del++;
}
else if(count==2)
{
if(s[i]=='X')
{
count=1;
}
else
del++;
}
i++;
}
cout<<del<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
